From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia




2023 Indian filmMystery of the TattooRelease posterDirected byKalaiarasi SathappanGanesh MahadevanWritten byKalaiarasi SathappanProduced byGajinaath JeyakumarKashish KhanAnushree ShahStarring
Arjun Rampal
Rohit Raaj
Daisy Shah
Manoj Joshi
Ameesha Patel
Music byMagizhan SanthorsProductioncompaniesKashish Khan Production, Tattoo Film ProductionDistributed byPickle entertainmentRelease date
1 September 2023 (2023-09-01)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Mystery of the Tattoo is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language psychological thriller film directed by Kalaiarasi Sathappan and Ganesh Mahadevan. Produced by Gajinaath Jeyakumar, Kashish Khan, and Anushree Shah.[1] The film stars Arjun Rampal, Rohit Raaj, Daisy Shah, Manoj Joshi, Ameesha Patel, Myra Sareen, Tom Hendryk, Arun Kapur, Saira Pandhal, Jamie Lambe, and Suki Chottmore.[2]


Cast[edit]
Rohit Raaj as Vikarn Abhimanyu[3]
Daisy Shah as Aathmika[4]
Rohit Belani (actor) as Yusuf Khan
Manoj Joshi
Myra Sareen
Tom Hendry as Officer Orth
Arun Kapur as Student Arun
Saira Pandhal
Jamie Lambe
Suki Chott
Andriana Mourelle [5]
Arjun Rampal as Karan Abhimanyu (cameo appearance)
Ameesha Patel as Chitra Devi (cameo appearance)
Production[edit]
Rohit Raaj made his debut lead role through this film[6].The film was Filmed in London during Pandemic[7]Ameesha Patel and Arjun Rampal made a cameo role in this film[8].The trailer launch of the film was held on 19 August 2023[9][10]

Reception[edit]
Archika Khurana of Times of india rated two out of five and stated that "The character’s arcs are too cliched."[11]Amar Ujala critic one point five out of five started and gave mixed reviews[12]
